tasks.gui:clean: deno eval "try { Deno.removeSync('dist', { recursive: true }); } catch (e) {} Deno.mkdirSync('dist', { recursive: true });"
tasks.build-gui: deno task gui:clean && deno task gui:bundle && deno task gui:copy
tasks.start-gui: deno task build-gui && deno run --allow-net --allow-read jsr:@std/http/file-server dist --port 4237
tasks.dev:clean: deno eval "try { Deno.removeSync('dist-temp', { recursive: true }); } catch (e) {} Deno.mkdirSync('dist-temp', { recursive: true });"
tasks.dev-gui: deno task dev:clean && deno task dev:bundle && deno task dev:copy
